channel.title: Business Line on Shenzhen Juku Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd
channel.description: Recent content in Business Line on Shenzhen Juku Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd

item.title: Market analysis selection
item.description: We will analysis industry and market and select products from the perspective of Amazon sellers (by big data tools) to identify segmented products with competitive opportunities.

item.title: Sales Channel Control
item.description: To ensure the product life cycle. We control the sale channels.

item.title: Product Definition
item.description: we can make differentiated and competitive products by combining the target market, competition, and technological development trends.

item.title: Product design and development
item.description: It includes ID design, electronic scheme/app scheme, structural design, functional test, reliability test, etc.

item.title: Cost Analysis
item.description: We will consider all the rigid Cost for international seller, including Product cost, the shipping fee to FBA warehouse, FBA packing fee.

item.title: Manufacturing and Supply Chain Management
item.description: We will do trial production analysis, mass production data analysis, etc.
